text: Are xbꞌantaj ronojel we jastaq riꞌ, ri José ri kel pa Arimatea xeꞌ rukꞌ ri Pilato, xuꞌta che ri utyoꞌjal ri Jesús rech kumuqu. Ri José jun chike ri utijoxelabꞌ ri Jesús pune xaq pa awal, jeriꞌ rumal kuxiꞌj ribꞌ chike ri winaq aꞌj Israel. Ri Pilato xuya bꞌe che ri José xukꞌam bꞌik ri utyoꞌjal ri Jesús.
